turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi I'd like to order a few pizzas from Jim's Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Jim's Pizzeria is closest to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one near Ala Moana Shopping center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay got it, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like two large pizzas, thin crust, one pepperoni, one bacon and cheddar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sorry, bacon and cheddar is no longer available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Aww, okay. Maybe the second one as combination then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Two large pizzas, one pepperoni, one combination, both thin crust, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The cost will be $29.84, is this okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, just pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, delivery or pickup?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pickup is preferrable.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Pickup it is, I'm placing your order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes, I've texted you the details.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, cheers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy your meal!
